title: Baby Formula SHORTAGE! Who's to BLAME?
description:
Parents in America are struggling to get baby formula for their children. We take a deep dive to explain how this happened and who's to blame. Also, while Americans are trying to feed children, Democrats voted Wednesday night to abort them. And why did an actor glue his hand to a Starbucks counter? #BabyFormula #BabyFormulaShortage #BabyFormulaCrisis
